column3:
I love this addicting game! However I dislike that there was NO option for 
a tutorial (I downloaded it based on reviews then had to use Google to 
figure out what I was doing) and sometimes the controls skip after I swipe, 
which results in the tiles moving in a way I'm not too sure I instigated. 
...Full ReviewI love this addicting game! However I dislike that there was NO option for 
a tutorial (I downloaded it based on reviews then had to use Google to 
figure out what I was doing) and sometimes the controls skip after I swipe, 
which results in the tiles moving in a way I'm not too sure I instigated. 
Would Also be really cool if there were a more social aspect, such as total 
high scores or among friends, or even ways to competitively play.

It is incredibly addicting! I usually get bored of a game in a week or so, 
but I've been playing this for months and cant get enough. It is perfect 
because you can just pick it up and play anytime. I have gotten so close to 
2048 at least a dozen times, but it's incredibly hard to do.

This is a great game, great time passer but on Android I've consistently 
had a problem with it randomly making moves on its own ultimately making me 
lose all my progress. I'm done, I got so far this time and all that 
progress was lost, I can't bring myself to keep playing this game if that's 
wha...Full ReviewThis is a great game, great time passer but on Android I've consistently 
had a problem with it randomly making moves on its own ultimately making me 
lose all my progress. I'm done, I got so far this time and all that 
progress was lost, I can't bring myself to keep playing this game if that's 
what's going to happen everytime I make this much progress.

Great fun game. Lots of time to waste here. Easy to play, you'll keep 
coming back to it and you can fulfill that 'need to play something but I've 
only got a few seconds' bug.

Needs a 0.25 second cooldown between swipes to prevent accidental double 
swiping. Other than that minor issue, this is the best mobile game. Period.

While the game is great and everything.. Its perpetually crashing, 
sometimes I even lose progress on the game that I'm playing.. Hope this can 
be fixed. Thank you.

We need to stop games like these. SAID NO ONE EVER. this game is so 
addicting! I can't stop!! love it 10/5 stars. :)

Great game, but sometimes the game will double swipe randomly, maybe 
because it's too sensitive to some of the touches? Makes it more difficult 
to win!

Simple, fun, and challenging. Can get addictive. They have different levels 
for once you master the original goal of vetting 2048. However once you 
achieve 2048 you can keep going to see what's the largest combo you can 
make. Highly recommend!

Straight forward and to the point. I've spent hours getting lost in trying 
to achieve that elusive number... As well as it's larger iterations.

Just don't go too fast, it glitches which can be really annoying, 
especially if you are in free play

I love this number puzzle game! Its very easy to learn and there are 
different size game board u can choose from so once u master one bard u can 
try the next! So much fun and a great time killer!

After a sum time by playing this game the eyes get tired , you should make 
the game's background black ,, please make an update about it

Probably one of the best 2048 games available, as you can alter the grid 
size. A bigger grid (5x5 or more) significantly increases your ability to 
gain a good score

2048 is a no-nonsense game that's right to the point and can provide for 
countless hours of recreation. It is by far my favorite app on my phone, as 
I have spent countless hours in waiting rooms, classrooms, restrooms, and 
car rides just amusing the hell out of myself with this game. great game. ...Full Review2048 is a no-nonsense game that's right to the point and can provide for 
countless hours of recreation. It is by far my favorite app on my phone, as 
I have spent countless hours in waiting rooms, classrooms, restrooms, and 
car rides just amusing the hell out of myself with this game. great game. 
Very fun to start over and over again

Good brain teaser and one of the best ways to time pass anywhere... Mainly 
in boring lectures and meetings üòÇ

Good, mindless, addictive game. I should say I don't like it because it

It's a good game and addicting. However it will sometimes make moves by 
itself and I can't undo it making me lose the order I had it in.

You combine randomly placed twos and fours to create higher numbers and 
combine them until you get to the total 2048. afterwards you can keep going 
until you've reached numbers in multi billions

I like the simple design and the starburst colours, but it gets a little 
boring. Consider adding themes and challenges the way some other classic 
games have done. Otherwise, the app itself is great. No bugs, no crashes.

It keeps shutting down now, can't open the app. Otherwise a great game. My 
mom's is also shutting down so it's not just my phone. Fix and I'll update.

I love this game super addictive. I have it on multiple devices. The only 
issue is when I play it on my phone it'll freeze up for a second and then 
it looks like my board has moved 2 or 3 times

Nice game.  Fast and easy to play.  However, every time a game ends you are forced to watch an advertisement.  Every time is simply obnoxious.  I might pay for the game if it were less pushy with the ads... Uninstalled.  :(

It's a great game but the "Tap to conntinue button doesn't work. It gets 
boring only playing to 2048 and having to restart the game. Please fix and

The game can be defeated in almost any mode if you just mindlesly 
sequentially swipe the finger in circles: up, left, down, right, rinse 
repeat. The reason is because game adds low numbers to be stucked in random 
cells and by moving the array in circle you just spread them and absorb by 
array at...Full ReviewThe game can be defeated in almost any mode if you just mindlesly 
sequentially swipe the finger in circles: up, left, down, right, rinse 
repeat. The reason is because game adds low numbers to be stucked in random 
cells and by moving the array in circle you just spread them and absorb by 
array at random location, avoiding the main killer of this game: a stacked 
up corner of high numbers. After gameplay is defeated with the dumbest 
strategy, the game kinda sucks.

It's a ripoff of the original one. I made sure it was the real one by

was a RIPOFF

Great game to pass the time and very addictive, however I don't know why 
they included a 3√ó3 board when with that amount of space you cannot 
possibly win, don't believe me? A quick way to figure out the highest 
number in the absolute end of a board is 2^(board dimensions). 
2^(3√ó3)=1034,therefore...Full ReviewGreat game to pass the time and very addictive, however I don't know why 
they included a 3√ó3 board when with that amount of space you cannot 
possibly win, don't believe me? A quick way to figure out the highest 
number in the absolute end of a board is 2^(board dimensions). 
2^(3√ó3)=1034,therefore, you would only be able to half compete it.

what a stupid game. I beat my previous high score, (when I was trying) of

left, up, right. Try it, you'll probably beat your own high score too.

I would assume that they have been "hacked" somehow to display these fake scores. The top high scores are literally orders of magnitude higher than it is physically possible to get.  I would assume that they have been "hacked" somehow to display these fake scores. I enjoy 2048 alot. I play it alot and I would consider myself pretty good, my high score is 250,000. When i was building on that high score, the screen glitched and swiped a number of times, ruining the order of the numbers. This has happened on multiple occasions only in this app. It's not such a b...Full ReviewI enjoy 2048 alot. I play it alot and I would consider myself pretty good, my high score is 250,000. When i was building on that high score, the screen glitched and swiped a number of times, ruining the order of the numbers. This has happened on multiple occasions only in this app. It's not such a big problem for people that are newer, but when you've got big numbers, such as 8192, it makes the game unplayable.
This game is challenging. I was so addicted I wanted to se what would happen if I got up to 4096.  Well ai did and it actually worked! I even have a screen shot. Fun!
